articles.description: Album news revealed with release of third song from the project, swaggering blues number False Prophet
articles.content:
Bob Dylan has announced his first album of original songwriting in eight years.

articles.title: Paramore's Hayley Williams got therapy for depression after divorce from Chad Gilbert - Daily Mail
articles.description: Hayley, 31 said: 'My most memorable recurring dreams from childhood are all water related. I started to have a lot of those again. It resulted in me having panic attacks, and I ended up in a hospital.'
articles.content:
She is releasing her first solo album Petals For Armor on Friday.

articles.title: For all its absurdity, Netflix’s Dead to Me captures the grief, anger and sadness of losing a partner - The Independent
articles.description: The first season ended with a cliffhanger – did Jen kill Steve or not? But what is most poignant about the second season is not who killed him, but how well the show deals with grief, writes Charlotte Cripps
articles.content: In the new season of Netflixs Dead to Me, Linda Cardellinis Judy snuggles up to a large freezer, inside which is the body of her murdered ex-fiancé. It is a strangely tender moment. I cant sleep and I dont think Steve can either, she tells her best friend Jen… [+3191 chars]

articles.title: Banksy pays tribute to 'superhero' nurses in new piece donated to hospital - Euronews
articles.description: Banksy's latest piece depicts a little boy playing with a nurse superhero toy. He left it at the University Hospital Southampton with a note thanking staff for their work.

articles.description: Brian Howe, who replaced Paul Rodgers in Bad Company and spent nearly a decade with the band, has died

articles.description: The Kraftwerk cofounder died aged 73. Here, we look back on 11 essential records from the catalogue of his pioneering band.
